meanings.sent1: The councillors gathered to discuss the new park.
meanings.sent2: The city councillors voted on the new budget proposal.
meanings.sent3: The councillors had a friendly competition to see who could solve the puzzle first.
meanings.sent4: The councillors were the stars of the town's annual play, each playing a different role.
meanings.sent5: The councillors worked together like a team of superheroes, each with a unique power to help the community.

meanings.definition: A person who is a member of a council.
meanings.sent1: Sheila was elected as one of the councillors for the neighborhood council.
meanings.sent2: The councillors met every month to address local issues.
meanings.sent3: The councillors decided to have a potluck dinner to bond outside of meetings.
meanings.sent4: The councillors were like puzzle pieces, each fitting perfectly into the council's work.
meanings.sent5: The councillors were like the gears in a clock, each playing a crucial role in keeping things running smoothly.
